website_summaries.verdict: The best disc brake lock with a heavy-duty casing for extra security and protection.
pros: Disc brake offers plenty of protection against common hand tools potential thieves use to break common locks
The design of the lock slides easily onto the disc brake with little effort
cons: Bright yellow paint can start to come off in high heat or bad weather

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch on the security rating.  4 vs 7
customer_reviews.text: This product was sold by and fulfilled by Amazon. The Kryptonite 000884 I received only has a security rating of 4. The one pictured in Amazon's listing has a security rating of 7, the one you think you are purchasing. Others purchasers have complained of this same mistake in the Q&A section. Unfortunately I don't have time to return it due to an upcoming road trip. I need one now, so I'll give this one a try, but I'm not confident it's a very strong lock. Hopefully it acts as a deterrent. AMAZON please fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Snapped Like Plastic, bike stolen 2 days later
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this a good review, but my motorcycle was stolen two days after placing this on my rear tire (and a second disc lock by another brand on the front). It looks like it was snapped right off, but not sure how as it didn’t look like they took a grinder to it. The bike was taken out of a gated parking garage, so this might help keep honest people honest when your out in public at events during the day, but definitely not a good overnight security item.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited almost a year to write this review, this lock worked for me...Last night they tried to steal my bike, snipped a cable masterlock from the front wheel to a pole and when they tried to roll the bike I had the lock on the rear caliper it fully stopped them...they took my neighbors bike instead!! Just a note, you need to use chain lube on the lock about every 2 months to keep the operation smooth...just like any lock open to the elements!
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Giordano

customer_reviews.title: LOCK GETS STUCK
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it negative stars this thing cost me so much money. I had it for about 2 weeks. Then I went out to ride my bike and the thing was stuck, the lock wouldn't move. Spent an hour trying to get it off before I finally went and bought a tool to cut it off. I wanted it for security against thieves not against myself... Good thing I was at home and had a car.
customer_reviews.author: Too_Fragile

customer_reviews.title: Much better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: Well let me start by saying how MISLEADING this amazon page is. When I first ordered it claimed the black and the other yellow lock are both 6/10 security and the same price. So I chose yellow so I might notice it on the bike and not forget. Well I get the yellow lock in the mail and it's only 4/10 security. So I check the amazon page now and it shows a pic of the black lock and it says it is only 4/10 security and $10 more now? Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Keith1212

customer_reviews.title: Provides that extra layer of security and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: A great wheel lock - well made and dependable. Ideal for those nights when my bike has to be outside. Provides that extra layer of security and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye HD Rider

customer_reviews.title: Works fine until it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a little extra security for my scooter. It worked fine for a couple weeks until one day it just wouldn’t open. The key went in and turned but wouldn’t pop open. I had to go to Lowe’s and buy a hacksaw to try and cut it off, but on an employees advice I put the key in the lock and hit it with a hammer, and it finally popped open. Its worked fine since then, but if I hadn’t been at home when it happened or hadn’t had another mode of transportation I would’ve been out of luck. I probably wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good lock for your 2 wheeled ride.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Triumph Thruxton. It seems to be very good quality and feel that it will stand up well. The bright color along with the reminder cable that comes with it do a great job of letting you know it is installed before trying to move your bike. I persoanlly wish you could remove the key when it was unlocked so I could leave it unlocked for transport and install it without having to fumble around with the key to unlock it just to install it. But I see the point that you can't accidentally leave it unlocked...so it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Smith

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like This
customer_reviews.text: This is replacing a larger Kryptonite Disk Lock on my ride. I prefer Kryptonite locks in general; I already have a chain unit for my bicycle. The old Keeper disk lock reached across the disk; this one fits into the smaller vent holes. With a smaller pin and casing than the older Keeper, it might be possible to sledge it open or (eventually) cut though the case with a cut-off saw, but no casual thief will beat this little guy with hand tools, and that's all I need for my backup security. The cap seal over the keyhole is a nice touch; I had to periodically oil the older unit to prevent surface rust and keep the lock operation smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R

customer_reviews.title: Great as part of a pair of locks
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good little lock. The pin is only ~5mm thick (pretty thin) making it likely to fit most bikes but also less material to cut thru if it ever happens. Best bet is to use it as part of a pair of locks + a chain to a solid object, if possible. I use this little Keeper 5s on the vents of my CRF250L's front disc and have a Kryptonite Evolution 4 (14mm thick!) on the rear disc.
customer_reviews.author: mxb

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't for me
customer_reviews.text: Should have read closer about this cause I was disappointed when it arrived. It is what it said but it's just small and seems easy to break or cut with someone bent on theft. The reminder cord could have been longer. The rear wheel is your better wheel to secure. After pulling the cord around my Harley saddle bags it barely reaches the seat to be visable. This is a 4 rated lock on a scale of 10, so there's that. Every lock can be compromised given the time. This one is only going to keep honest people honest IMO.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fits my BMW 2004 R1150 RT brake disc.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is smooth, well designed and the instructions are easy to follow. They also have the greatest deal for free called "key Safe." It took me all of two minutes to register my key. If I lose it, no..... when I lose it, I can easily get another for free or a small cost. Great added value. Plus, it easily fit my disc brake holes on my BMW. I suspect this lock can be drilled or defeated, but not easily. I would buy a secondary lock to slow down any thiref from rolling your motorcycle away.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Used this in Mexico and my bike didn't get stolen!
customer_reviews.text: used this lock while i was traveling in mexico for 10 days, and my motorcycle wasn't stolen... so i guess it did its job. didnt see any kind of evidence that it was tampered with, no no real way to know if this is was kept my bike safe, or it was never going to be stolen in the first place, but better to be safe than sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Lock gets jammed easily, now it has to be cut off..
customer_reviews.text: This lock constantly jams up and now is stuck on my bike.. This has been used inside a garage and still cannot function properly, I can't imagine how quickly this lock would fail if exposed to the elements. Definitely avoid this lock unless you want to cut it off your bike some day soon.
customer_reviews.author: JB238

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use, so you'll actually use it
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest, if you park your bike in public they will take it if they really want it no matter what you do. So the trick is to detour them by not being an easy target. If a device is too difficult or cumbersome you will eventually stop using it,tgen the thieves get your bike. This device is quick and easy and may buy you a reprieve against a lazy thief. It is easy enough to use you that won't just blow it off because it is such a pain. Your bike is worth 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Norris B. Heckwine

customer_reviews.title: Key stuck first time I tried after opening package. Not confident I'll get it unlocked if I use it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems strong, well-made, except for one thing, the key sticks in the lock. First time I used it and I've only used it twice since then for worry of not being able to get it unlocked. You have to jiggle and force and try this and that to get the key in, then to get it to turn. Not confidence inspiring at all.
customer_reviews.author: TRJ

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought and but effective enough. Thankfully I live in a safe enough area to not worry too much about getting my bike stolen but the lock and the orange reminder cable that comes with it does a good job in deterring away potential thieves while also making sure I take off my locks before starting the bike. I have to note though that on several occasions it was a little hard to unlock it, my key would go in but it wouldn't turn. Luckily I have never had to call someone to cut the lock but I think if you gently wiggle the key in, it'll work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Solid but sometimes frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with how solid the lock feels, but the functionality of the locking mechanism is quite temperamental. The lock even indicates on it to not turn until the key is fully inserted, so they are aware of issues. But even if you use caution to not turn the key, it can easily move despire this, and then getting it unlocked becomes a challenge. Not impossible, but once it took me a few minutes of messing with it to finally get it to disengage. I've only had issues 3 or 4 times, and all the others have been easy though (so maybe 5% adverse). Worth the protection, but it seems some better design could eliminate this known issue.
customer_reviews.author: ricallen

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I guess this does what it is designed to do, but the execution is disappointing. The rain/ dust cover that is supposed to keep the lock working smoothly will not stay in place. It is pretty much useless. Why even put it on? The yellow paint chips really easily too. But, like I said, it does exactly what it is supposed to do, so maybe that’s enough.
customer_reviews.author: ProudDad450

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing. It's heavy, but small enough to go in my riding jacket pocket. I pull it out when I get to work, take 5 seconds to attach it to the front disc (will not fit on the rear disc), put the 'reminder lanyard' on my ignition stalk, and I'm off. It's highly visible, feels and looks tough, and it gives me great peace of mind. The black keyhole cover could certainly stick better (it doesn't at all) when there's no key in it, but it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Godofkoty

customer_reviews.title: No one is casually stealing your bike with this on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and a great deterrent. Someone would have an awful lot of trouble using bolt cutters and most likely would have to destroy the front brake rotor to forcefully remove this. A blow torch would get through it, but would also most likely damage the front disk brake. Great buy for my motorcycle, gives me piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Chadillac

customer_reviews.title: Best lock for quick 1-15min trips
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my fat tire ebike. It is perfect! I know these types are generally used for motorcycles and big scooters but it'll work on a bicycle. Do note that my bike is around 90lbs all geared up, it's not going to be rolled away with this on the rear wheel. And they aren't going to be able to maneuver it rolling on the front wheel alone. With this on, I can comfortably leave my bike on the side of a store and make some quick purchases without having to do a whole locking procedure that would take longer than what I would spend buying something.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Carranza

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for a while and I'm pleased by the durability
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while and I'm pleased by the durability, fit, and finish. I also use a hardened steel lock on the steering column and I feel confident the other motorcycles on the lot with no security devices will be stolen first in the event anything bad goes down. If a determined thief does target my bike, at least I made it a pain in the butt for him. If you register with Kryptonite they will send you a free pair of replacement keys if you accidentally lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Registering it for replacement keys is a nice bonus. Easily stored under a seat
customer_reviews.text: Registering it for replacement keys is a nice bonus. Easily stored under a seat, high visibility to deter thieves, includes a "must have" leash to avoid accidentally taking off and destroying your rotor. If a 3 guys with a van want your bike, it's gone no matter what you use, but this will deter the "theft of opportunity" thieves.
customer_reviews.author: Cyseye

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid disc lock. It is true somebody with the proper saw could cut it off though it would take a bit and be rather loud. If they had a truck and a device to lift over 500lbs they could cut it off at their leisure. Though I believe most crime to be opportunity based, and placing difficulties in the way will encourage criminals to move on to an easier score. So buy it, it is a good disc lock.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Keep my bike in a carport and feel much better about it when I am away from the house ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep my bike in a carport and feel much better about it when I am away from the house and the bike is still there. The lock is very durable and performs/works as described. The rubber keyhole guard doesn't stick/hold over the keyhole all the time unless I really jam it, but other than that I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the product, except to start off I would recommend (with pretty much any motorcycle lock) to spray WD-40 in the keyhole. Funny enough, the only complaint I have is that the product doesn't say it comes with a reminder cable, so I ended up wasting $20 on two reminder cables that I didn't need. (And for some reason Kryptonite sells reminder cables for $10)
customer_reviews.author: WheatleyOS

customer_reviews.title: Durable, heavy product
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, awesome product that gives me peace of mind. Anybody who wants to steal your bike can 100% find a way to cut through as the pin that goes through the brake rotor is thin; however, it’s still good peace of mind. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Well designed lock from one of the best lock companies. For what it's designed to do, it's the best. Ultimately, it is best to lock the entire bike to a secured object, but this helps prevent it from being rolled away. Please note, the 4/10 security rating on the package is an overall security suggestion by the company, and has nothing to do with the quality of this lock. Locking the wheel of your bike is a four out of ten rating, while locking it to the floor of a secured garage would be ten out of ten.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Picklesworth

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a disc lock for motorcycle with smaller rear disc brake vents like Ninja 300
customer_reviews.text: Fits in the rear disc holes of a ninja 300. Don't know why people are having problems with the lock. Follow the instructions and push the key in all the way (fully insert) before turning the key. Then it will never jam.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lam

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wast you time or money on this lock..
customer_reviews.text: I put the lock on my disc,the next morning I went to take it off and I literally fought with the lock to unlock it.. I wasn’t rough with it,didn’t force the key in,etc.. I didn’t have the packaging to send it back so I threw it away!!
customer_reviews.author: MC Prospect

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, short reminder cable.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for our Honda Grom. Installs and removes easily with 2 included keys. Bright yellow finish announces its presence to would-be thieves, and to you as a reminder to remove before leaving. Only downside is the super short "reminder" cable that is included. Even on our tiny bike, it barely reached the bars or ignition switch without a tight stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Dion T

customer_reviews.title: Mine is Stuck too
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a few months. Went to remove it today and it will absolutely not unlock/come off. Tried tapping with hammer, lubricant inside the lock, wiggling the key to exhaustion, etc. Nothing works. I'm going to have to cut it off. I should have listened to the bad review I saw here so trust me, don't put yourself through and buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sovesky

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: Good lock. Only two gripes. It's really hard to get the rubber insert that protects the keyhole area to stay in there. Also, yellow paint rubs off onto the brake disc. I'd probably still buy it again, though.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: This unfortunately has become a necessity for motorcyclist. Works great, like anything else it could be cut off but it would take some work. Like the orange cable so you don't forget it is on and it also advertises that you use one quickly to the bad guys. Make your bike not look like the easy target to thief's and use it.
customer_reviews.author: IFISHAZ

customer_reviews.title: Please be safe and get one for your bike, it’s worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: There is no chance someone is touching my bike without everyone hearing it. It isn’t to sensitive that the wind on my tarp sets it off, but if someone were to sit on it or tip it, it will definitely chime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind when parked in sketchy areas
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my Electra Glide. With the reminder cable, I have not tried to drive away with the lock on yet (knocking on wood). The lock is heavy and needs something strong and durable to wrap it in when it is stored in the saddle bag. I kept the original packaging (paper and cardboard) but it has already worn it through.
customer_reviews.author: Trailman

customer_reviews.title: Works great, stows away easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought the yellow lock to attract more attention to the lock and deter thieves from trying to steal my motorcycle. I love having the orange reminder cable because it draws more attention to the lock and is very easy to use and coil up. The lock fits into the holes of my brake disc easily and the key does not remove unless the lock is locked, so it gives me peace of mind that it's properly locked when I leave my bike. Fits well with the cable under the passenger seat of my 2005 Kawasaki Ninja 636, which is great because cargo space is not impressive on a sports bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tej Grewal

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, worried about longevity
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright disk lock that you can see from about a block away. Ive had mine for a couple months but it already started to scratch which makes me wonder how durable the lock actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Saagar

customer_reviews.title: Best for motorcycles.
customer_reviews.text: Was reluctant to get this after seeing its mixed reviews. Yes, the product is heavy but its serves the purpose. We have to lube it more frequently to avoid jamming the keys. It's an essential for motorcycle owners.
customer_reviews.author: Sabarish Narain

customer_reviews.title: The reminder cable is a HUGE plus. I even ...
customer_reviews.text: The reminder cable is a HUGE plus. I even use the cable reminder to lock my helmet. Doesn't prevent my bike to be loaded into a van, but it keeps someone from rolling it away. Kryptonite: If the cable would be twice as long, you can really market it as an included lock mechanism for jackets or helmets. I've been asked at many events where I bought my helmet lock, so the demand is there. Check the image attached.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on my road trip
customer_reviews.text: used it on my road trip to and from the 80th annual Sturgis rally. Rode out there by myself, so wanted to make sure no one could easily steal my Indian Scout 60.
customer_reviews.author: LAWSONRANGER

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: This lock works fine and is easy to use. It is a little bit short for my longer ride so it only goes barely over the handle. In addition, the paint comes off very easily which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: The less expensive lock has a "4" security rating
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and comes with the reminder cable. Four stars because it isn't clear on the product page that the more expensive yellow lock is different than the less expensive lock. I got the less expensive one, and it has a "4" security rating, not 7 as pictured. It will still do it's job and I am happy with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ahniwa D. Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lock and Perfect Deterrant!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and works just as expected! Have not had to deal with any theft attempts yet but hopefully this will deter them away enough to keep it from happening! Love the product and love that it comes with the reminder cable! If you're reading this, buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good Security Deterrent...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a long distance trip on my bike...fortunately I didn't need to use it as all areas where I parked at night were well lit, pretty secure and in my sight; however, it was a great tool to keep on the bike for when I truly need it.
customer_reviews.author: clerkjane

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I got his for my moped, and it works, but it is hard to get the lock on and off. The key sometimes works and sometimes does not, frustrating. The key needs some coaxing, I haven't had to give up and walk away yet.
customer_reviews.author: EPreuss

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Its waterproof feature isn't to good. When it rains the rubber cap doesn't work. It only works when it's dry weather.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheesy for a kryptonite product
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping it would have came with an audible alarm but I guess not. I returned it and found a nice chrome one that was way beefier and had a pretty loud alarm if it was messed with..
customer_reviews.author: Carramrod

customer_reviews.title: Super solid, fits quick and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy super solid design with a pick resistant deep socket key lock. Very impressed and highly recommend it. Fits in a sec.
customer_reviews.author: jmnvhc

customer_reviews.title: Great price and as described
customer_reviews.text: Works well and a nice price. Easy to use and still relatively small so it doesn't take up a lot of space when being carried around.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: solid little device!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came a little banged up from shipping but that doesn’t effect its performance. It’s heavy, it’s solid, and the locking mechanism is smooth. It’s a good piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: David Pothier

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately for me the padlock is not strong enough to prevent my FZ09 from being stolen. As you can see in the photos that I attached to the criminals it was easy to break the padlock without damaging the brake disc. The only padlock that they could not completely break was a XENA brand.
customer_reviews.author: Power Ranger

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to deter thieves
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to deter thieves. Its strong and compact. And can't be beat for the price. I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Solid Unit
customer_reviews.text: Solid unit. Comes with reminder that hooks on to handlebar to make sure you don't ride off and destroy your disk brake. Fits my scooter disk brake well. Smooth key action. I got the yellow version to make the lock more obvious. May want a bigger size if using on motorbike. I am using on a 49cc scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. It's small and lightweight. However, if you use it without the reminder cord, you will forget, and it can easily cause damage, so don't forget that. Bottom line, you use what's easy to carry, and it's easy to carry. Fits my Ninja 300 disc
customer_reviews.author: EML

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy have the add extra security for my motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be heavy and well built. Comes this two keys and a bright orange cable to run form the lock to our handle to remind you that it’s there. I really enjoy have the add extra security for my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: James Vanover

customer_reviews.title: Bit heavy, but that makes it harder for thieves.
customer_reviews.text: Small, heavy lock for your disk breaks on your scooter or M-Cycle. I actually like this lock. So its worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Wildstar

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: Was told that it went on his bike with ease. Glad he has that little bit of extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Lit Nerd 5000

customer_reviews.title: It IS pretty heavy however
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't lock up my motorcycle longterm with this and assume it's completely safe, but for a quick lock up while running into a store. It does the job. Comes with a coiled reminder tether, and is small enough to carry with you. It IS pretty heavy however.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Brasi

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.................takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. The lock has a smooth mechanism and seems sturdy. It is heavy. Came with a reminder cord - overall I'm satisfied. Updating to five stars after two years. The lock still works like new - even after I forgot it was in a side bag and rode some trails for about 100 miles and it got banged up, dented and paint removed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Works great very easy to use. If you forget to take it off you'll find out it really works. It locks your front wheel right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Puente

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it, Of course If my bike gets stolen
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it, Of course If my bike gets stolen,,,, I will be back to down grade this :) Better then just leaving it locked.. 1 on front, 1 on back
customer_reviews.author: M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: You need one!
customer_reviews.text: You need one per motorcycle. The yellow color makes it easy to see if the bike is locked.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Piovaccari

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last 30 seconds against a thief, luckily they were too dumb to steal my bike. Instead they destroy the ignition and didn’t roll my bike away since they broke off the wheel lock already.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Lee Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted ....
customer_reviews.text: This is small, simple & I am realistic about the product - this is a THEFT DETERRENT item. Let the thieves go to the other low hanging fruit & not hassle my motorcycle while parked in public.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Thought

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and seems sturdy. Go this for my Honda Goldwing. Easy on and easy off. Thankfully I have never had to see if it really works or not, but it seems like it will do the job. Easy to carry as well. Small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Klima

customer_reviews.title: DOES GOOD JOB!
customer_reviews.text: The lock does a good job. Someone tried to steal my moto and torch the lock. I couldn't open it later so I have to use an angle grinder and it took me about 30/45mins to open.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The key is a little tricky!
customer_reviews.text: The key seems to get stuck sometimes! A little WD40 helped!
customer_reviews.author: Dug

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bicycle lock
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this bike lock. Pin small enough to fit through holes on bike. Much smaller lock then I thought from viewing picture (which is a good thing, who wants to carry around a herking lock), but it is still heavy duty Super pleased with quality and design of this product
customer_reviews.author: xs10shal

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but if you leave it off ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price but if you leave it off like me you can (like me) get your bike stolen.
customer_reviews.author: taythegibs

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and portable
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight enough to carry around with my motorcycle. Extra deterrent to theft. The reminder cord looks a little dumb but is bery useful to me!!
customer_reviews.author: yvonne doan

customer_reviews.title: What i don't like is you need the key in it to lock ...
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says. What i don't like is you need the key in it to lock it. It would be better to just be able to push the cylinder in to lock and use the key to unlock it. Overall it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably sturdy no audible notification
customer_reviews.text: My mistake but I thought this device was also audible alarm
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Won’t deter theft but effective in discouraging it
customer_reviews.text: A back up lock for my motorcycle. Super easy to use. Probably not the most effective lock but a useful deterrent. Purpose is to reduce opportunistic theft.
customer_reviews.author: S Kim

customer_reviews.title: I like the cable for reminders being very bright too
customer_reviews.text: Very obvious to thieves, I like the cable for reminders being very bright too. Won't stop a determined and prepared crook, but it's certainly a deterrent I'm happy to have on me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: No Storage Pouch
customer_reviews.text: The product description states it comes with a storage pouch. It does not.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Will stall a thief so you will have time to grab your 🔨
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: R6 great lock
customer_reviews.text: I have the lock the rear wheel of my R6 and it works great. The reminder cable definitely helps to remind me and keeps me from damaging my bike. The lock does fit under the stock pillion seat. I wouldn't have this as the only security at home but it works great when combined and works great on the go for parking on rides. It's quick to install and not coming off without a saw and time or the wheel itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is very noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to take on and off, and very noticeable from a distance as a deterrent. The rubber cover for the lock could be better fit though, it comes loose all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off the bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off the bike. Very visible. Kryptonite is a well known and respected brand. I can't speak to how secure it actually is however.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew in DFW

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I dropped it the 2nd week I had it and pin that retains the lock to the housing fell out so it was in 2 pieces. I fixed it with a roll pin but it coming apart was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McNeeley

customer_reviews.title: Bike Saver
customer_reviews.text: Twice my bike was almost stolen but this makes it difficult to move. It will stop the wheel from turning. I just need an alarm now.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Machado

customer_reviews.title: Fool Proof Protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Harley, for sure makes me feel safer. Easily attaches to the brake rotor. Very heavy, feels extremely sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G.

customer_reviews.title: Kryptonite is quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and has all the quality you trust in this brand. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: trav15t

customer_reviews.title: Added security
customer_reviews.text: Compact, yet durable. Must have if you want extra piece of mind when leaving bike for longer period in a parking lot or outside your garage.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: The lock was definitely not of the quality that is advertised. Returned it. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell R.

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and a good price. my bike hasn't been stolen yet so I guess it working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Chattanooga Guy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sound deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: It bright and can be seen, a nice haevy piece of metal. It will take some time to get it off. I'm happy with my purchase ........5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Coach B

customer_reviews.title: it appears to more secure than most others
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe it has been tested yet but I work in Baltimore so it is a matter of time.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Manas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, and offers peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I own a very light motorcycle and I was worried about parking it in the city. This little disc lock is easy to install, and with the orange lanyard, it looks uninviting for any would-be thief. My only wish is that there was a way to easily use the orange lanyard as an additional security measure (for locking up helmets or other gear). Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LBB

customer_reviews.title: So far it feels solid and functions as it's supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it feels solid and functions as it's supposed to. I'd buy again. There are different security level meaning strength so look at that before final purchase. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Semiera

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction
customer_reviews.text: Another great Amazon transaction. Fits my springer front disc perfectly. Compact enough for easy carry but bright enough so that I won’t forget to pull it off
customer_reviews.author: combat 825

customer_reviews.title: Very compact
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and easy to use. Go this for my Honda VFR. Thankfully I have never had to see if it really works or not (bike stays indoors at night and gated during the day). Easy to carry as well. Small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Product seems to work as described, I haven’t tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work as described, I haven’t tried stealing my motorcycle to check... mostly I bought this to use the small cable that came with it to lock my motorcycle cover onto my front wheel, very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this badly made product
customer_reviews.text: terrible quality, not waterproof at all, don't even bother buying it, spend 10 dollars more and really protect your bike
customer_reviews.author: Lina Maria Noreña Castrillon

customer_reviews.title: High quality sturdy disc lock and it does come with a reminder ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and exactly what is stated. High quality sturdy disc lock and it does come with a reminder cable, not shown in pictures or stated but there is one
customer_reviews.author: Chad Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It looks very solid and reliable. I've used to had a similar one but with the alarm, though it was more expensive. Now I'm totally satisfied with this Kryptonite. The cool thing is that it has a reminder cable included.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksei Staroselets

customer_reviews.title: Good deterrent to roll away theft
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, seems to be good quality. Wish the locking pin was a little thicker, but visually its still a deterrent. If it prevents a roll away / ride away theft, then its great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Private

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. High visibility. Seems heavy duty and well constructed. Mechanism works great
customer_reviews.author: cesar mendoza

product_meta.title: Kryptonite 000884 Keeper 5s Yellow Disc Lock
product_meta.description: Color:YellowMotorcycle and scooter security for moderate crime areas dual reinforced high security disc style cylinder. 5mm pin diameter fits smaller vent holes. Compact lightweight and weatherproof. Includes pouch for easier transport. Stapler style disc lock immobilizes vehicle to prevent roll-away or ride-away theft.
feature_bullets: Dual reinforced high security disc style cylinder
5mm pin diameter fits smaller vent holes
Stapler style disc lock immobilizes vehicle to prevent roll-away or ride-away theft
Includes bright orange reminder cable to prevent riding away while disc lock is engaged
Includes 2 Stainless Steel keys, with ergonomic design to reduce the amount of torque, and keep them from bending or breaking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,168 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
